body.p: The Templates tab specifies a list of directories where new file templates are located. These file templates are gathered from all the document types and presented in the various folders inside the Framework templates folder in the New document wizardNew from templates wizard.
To open the Templates tab of the Document type configuration dialog box, , go to Document Type Association, use the New, Edit, Duplicate, or Extend button, and click on the Templates tab.

The Templates tab includes the following actions:
New Opens a dialog box that allows you to specify the path to the directory of the template.
Edit Opens a dialog box that allows you to edit the path of the selected template.
Delete Deletes the currently selected template from the list.
Move Up Moves the selected template up one spot in the list.
Move Down Moves the selected template down one spot in the list.
